bookSourceComment:
需登录
如果文章有更新，要先更新目录，在刷新正文
loginUrl:
<js>
function login(){
	email = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("邮箱");
	pwd = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
	url = "https://api.unifans.io/account/login";
	body = {
          "boundMailbox": String(email),
          "password": String(pwd)
         }
	post = {
		"method":"POST",
		"body":JSON.stringify(body)
		   }
	url = url+","+JSON.stringify(post);
	token = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.token;
	authorization = "hgq "+token;
 authorization = {
 	"authorization":String(authorization)
 	}	; 
 	source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(authorization));
	}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.data.collection.nickName
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
if(/getPersonalInfo/.test(baseUrl)){
	result =java.getString("$.data.description")+`\n-----复制下面文字粘贴至发现地址-----\n{{$.data.homeName}}::data:getPersonalInfo;base64,{\{java.base64Encode("domainName={{$.data.domainName}}&_t="+Date.now())}\},{"type":""}`
	}else{
		result = java.getString("$.data.collection.comment")
		}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.data.collection.name

ruleContent.content:
if(/data:postId/.test(baseUrl)){ postid = java.hexDecodeToString(result) result = JSON.parse(book.customVariable)[postid]; }else if(/getCollectionDetail/.test(baseUrl)){ if(book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index){ url = "https://api.unifans.io/creator/getCollectionDetail?collectionId={{$.data.collection._id}}&_t="+Date.now(); title = "{{$.data.collection.name}}"; url = "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+encodeURIComponent(url); java.log(url) script = `data:text/html;charset=utf-8, 《${title}》加入书架

简介：${java.getString("$.data.collection.comment")}

跳转加入书架

`; java.startBrowser(script,"《"+title+"》") } result="❗️刷新本章节，跳转本书详情页\n"+'简介：'+java.getString("$.data.collection.comment")+"\n"+'' }else if(/getOne/.test(baseUrl)){ result = String(book.intro).replace(/img src/g,' ##\

ruleExplore.author: $.creatorName
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(/localhost/.test(baseUrl)){
	
let list = [];

domid = java.hexDecodeToString(result);

		合集链接 = "https://api.unifans.io/common/getCollections?"+domid;
		
	合集 = 	String(java.ajax(合集链接));
	java.setContent(合集);
	list = java.getElements("$.data.collections[*]").toArray();

		主页链接 = "https://api.unifans.io/creator/posts?"+domid+"&skip=0&limit=1000&order=1";
	主页 = 	String(java.ajax(主页链接));
		java.setContent(主页);
		主页list = java.getElements("$.data.posts[*]").toArray().sort((a, b) => {
    const hasAName = a.collectionDetails[0]?.name != null;
    const hasBName = b.collectionDetails[0]?.name != null;
    return hasAName - hasBName ;
});
		list = list.concat(主页list)
	result = list.length?JSON.stringify(list):`[{name:"无内容"}]`;
	}
	result
</js>
$.data.posts[*]||$.[*]
ruleExplore.name: {{$.name||$.title}}

ruleToc.chapterList: let list; function putContent(list){ let json = {} for(i in list){ text = String(java.getString("$.text",list[i])).replace(/<\/*span.*?>| style=".*?"/g,'').replace(/{{HOST}\}/g,'https://bucket-prod.unifans.io'); img =''; html = text+"\n"+img.replace(//g,''); postid = java.getString("$.postId",list[i]); json[postid] = html; } book.putCustomVariable(JSON.stringify(json)); } if(/getPostsByCollection/.test(baseUrl)){ list = java.getElements("$.data.posts[*]").toArray().sort((a, b) => a.createTime - b.createTime); putContent(list) result = list.length?JSON.stringify(list):`[{name:"无目录"}]` }else if(/getPersonalInfo/.test(baseUrl)){ domid = java.hexDecodeToString(result); 合集链接 = "https://api.unifans.io/common/getCollections?"+domid+"&_t={{Date.now()}}"; 合集 = String(java.ajax(合集链接)); java.setContent(合集); list = java.getElements("$.data.collections[*]").toArray(); 主页链接 = "https://api.unifans.io/creator/posts?"+domid+"&skip=0&limit=1000&order=1&_t={{Date.now()}}" 主页 = String(java.ajax(主页链接)); java.setContent(主页); 主页list = java.getElements("$.data.posts[*]").toArray().sort((a, b) => { const getName = (item) => item.collectionDetails?.[0]?.name ?? null; const nameA = getName(a); const nameB = getName(b); if (nameA === null && nameB !== null) return -1; if (nameA !== null && nameB === null) return 1; // 按 createTime 升序排列（旧的在前） return a.createTime - b.createTime; }); putContent(主页list) list = list.concat(主页list) result = list.length?JSON.stringify(list):`[{name:"无内容"}]` }else if(/getOne/.test(baseUrl)){ result = `[{name:"${book.name}"}]` } $.[*]
ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
if(/getPersonalInfo/.test(baseUrl)){
if(String(java.getString("$.name"))!==""){
				result = "https://api.unifans.io/creator/getCollectionDetail?collectionId={{$._id}}&_t="+Date.now();
		}else if(String(java.getString("$.title"))!==""){
				result = `data:postId;base64,${java.base64Encode("{{$.postId}}")},{"type":""}`;
			}
}	else if(/getPostsByCollection/.test(baseUrl)){
	result = `data:postId;base64,${java.base64Encode("{{$.postId}}")},{"type":""}`;
	}
</js>
